message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to spend closer to $105.  That's still a great deal for you and I'd be happy to take it off your hands.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to make a deal. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to sell it to you for $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $115. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with the product.
